name: Pizzeria Quattro Stagioni - TriJam70
description:
This is my Entry for the TriJam70. A Game Jam where you have to create a Game in only 3 Hours.

The Theme was "Seasons". I decided to Make a Pizza Game where you have to prepare Pizza in the Pizzeria Quattro Stagioni (If my italian is good enough: Stagioni means Season ;-))

I used Godot Engine and Aseprite to create the Game.

How to Play

Read the Pizza Order. Remember the ingredients. Drag and Drop the Ingredients on the Pizza. Click the black OK icon in the bottom right. Read the Pizza Order. Remember the ingredients ...

Dev Time Lapse
